product_name: Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: Keeping pace with you from spin class to the open roads, the Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II bike shoes combine on-bike performance with the good looks of a running shoe. Flexible forefoot and a nylon plate deliver pedaling stability and easy movement; shoes absorb shock, return energy and provide cushioning on and off bike. Uppers feature quick-drying, breathable mesh and synthetic leather. Just like your comfortable tennis shoes, the lace closure system and low-cut construction provide a light and fast fit. Outsoles feature running-shoe style rubber lugs to offer sure traction and durability when walking around off of the bike. The Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II bike shoes are compatible with 2-bolt cleats; please note that cleats are not included (cleats typically come with pedals).
short_description: Keeping pace with you from spin class to the open roads, the Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel II bike shoes combine on-bike performance with the good looks of a running shoe.
